summary: The desperate lives of two estranged twin brothers converge over missing drugs, politics, racial prejudice, corrupt cops and an unplanned pregnancy.
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Priyanka Chopra|Deb Mukherjee|Shivkumar Subramaniam|Chandan Roy Sanyal|Tenzing Nima|Hrishikesh Joshi|Rajatabha Dutta|Harish Khanna|Carlos Paca|Eric Santos|Amole Gupte|Sagar|Samrat|Vijay Raj|Vishal Bhosle|Omkar Govardhan|Flavia|Indivar Bhatia|Satyajit Sharma|Neena|Veena|Bugs Bhargava|Nawab Khan|Mukesh Chhabra|Vishwanath Chatterjee|Vinod Rai|Aakash Dahiya|Dheerendra Dwivedi|Nandkishore Pant|Puhja Verma|Neha Shitoley|Feroza Khan|Geetanjali Chatterjee|Aarti Kelkar|Shashank Shende|Eenesh Chavan|Vishwas Sohoni|Nachiket Purnapatre|Deepak Damle|Amit Kalyankar|Ishandeep Singh|Shantanu Vaidya|Jay Aditya Giri|Ambrish|Ritika Handa|Richashree|Gayatri|Anuja|Ashlesha Tavhare|Adil Hussain|Ramesh|Deepak|Sandesh Jadhav|Patrícia Bull|Azaan Shah|Punita Grover|Deep Kulkarni|Ejaz Khan|Bittu|Abhay Kulkarni|Harish|Jayant Gadekar|Suresh Sharma|Vidula Javalgekar|Anjali|Chandrakant Taneja|Pavitra Sarkar|Farhad Ahmed Dehlvi|Ashok Kulkarni|Suhas Sirsat|Sanjay Vichare|Ravi More|Tanish Solanki|Lalit Kumar|William Collings|Shree Rammy Pandey|N.K. title: Kaminey
